Body:
P1 = np.array([1, 0])
P2 = np.array([0, 0])
P3 = np.array([0, 1])
P4 = np.array([0.5, 1])
calculated_points = vortex_position_in_panel(P1, P2, P3, P4)
expected_points = [np.array([0.5625, 0.5]), np.array([0.25, 0]), np.array([
    0.125, 1])]
assert_almost_equal(calculated_points, expected_points)
